member.name: IAppxEncryptedPackageWriter2.AddPayloadFilesEncrypted
member.summary: Adds one or more payload files to an encrypted app package.
member.param: The number of payload files to be added to the encrypted app package.
The payload files to be added.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

member.name: IAppxEncryptedPackageWriter2
member.summary: Provides a write-only object model for encrypted app packages.
